snippet: Even though Nevada Republicans have been voting at caucus sites around the state for hours now, we'll be waiting a long time before the state's G.O.P. officials release any actual votes.
abstract: Even though Nevada Republicans have been voting at caucus sites around the state for hours now, we'll be waiting a long time before the state's G.O.P. officials release any actual votes.

headline.main: The Challenges of Reporting Results in Nevada
